CSE '22 Yearbook

An unforgettable yearbook for an unforgettable batch

In order to preserve the memories of the alumni of the '22 batch, we have chosen the graduation yearbook of the CSE '22 as our first project. We are very excited with how the final product has turned out! Having sold copies at the convocation physically, we have now made it available for delivery across India.

The yearbook includes:

  1. Pictures of Fests and Festivals that the batch has experienced here in Silchar
  2. An individual quote and picture from every student from the CSE batch of 2022
  3. The general fresher's and branch fresher's for the batch
  4. Pictures of the branch photoshoot and the farewell party, Ruksat 2022
  5. Remembrances and content of the hostels, other events, and more fragments of nostalgia in the memory lane section
  6. A Slam Page where you can get your friends to sign something, whether you reunite with them today, tomorrow, or a few years down the line

Pricing
